tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AccessVlanId.description: Access VLAN ID, relevant only for VRF interfaces. This attribute is supported with NSX 3.0.0 onwards.

EdgeNodePath.description: Path of edge node for this interface, relevant for interfaces of type `EXTERNAL`.

EnablePim.description: Flag to enable Protocol Independent Multicast, relevant only for interfaces of type `EXTERNAL`. This attribute will always be `false` for other interface types. This attribute is supported with NSX 3.0.0 onwards, and only for local managers.

GatewayPath.description: Policy path for the Tier-0 Gateway.

Ipv6NdraProfilePath.description: IPv6 NDRA profile to be associated with this interface.

Mtu.description: Maximum Transmission Unit for this interface.

NsxId.description: The NSX ID of this resource. If set, this ID will be used to create the policy resource.

SegmentPath.description: Policy path for segment to be connected with this Tier1 Gateway. This argemnt is required for interfaces of type `SERVICE` and `EXTERNAL`.

SitePath.description: Path of the site the Tier0 edge cluster belongs to. This configuration is required for global manager only. `path` field of the existing `nsxt_policy_site` can be used here.

Subnets.description: list of Ip Addresses/Prefixes in CIDR format, to be associated with this interface.

Type.description: Type of this interface, one of `SERVICE`, `EXTERNAL`, `LOOPBACK`. Default is `EXTERNAL`.

UrpfMode.description: Unicast Reverse Path Forwarding mode, one of `NONE`, `STRICT`. Default is `STRICT`. This attribute is supported with NSX 3.0.0 onwards.
